title: Create Customer Booking Confirmation
description: Develop the booking confirmation page and flow for successful booking completion

user_stories: As a customer, I want to see booking confirmation so that I know my booking was successful
As a customer, I want to add bookings to my calendar so that I don't forget appointments
business_rules: Booking confirmation must display all booking details
Booking confirmation must provide calendar integration options
Booking confirmation must show next steps for the customer
Booking confirmation must handle both logged-in and anonymous users
edge_cases: Handling booking confirmation for anonymous users
Processing booking confirmation with missing details

acceptance_criteria: Booking confirmation displays complete booking details
Booking confirmation provides calendar integration options
Booking confirmation shows next steps for the customer
Booking confirmation handles both authenticated and anonymous users
Booking confirmation follows the design system

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement booking confirmation following React best practices. Use React Router for parameterized routing. Implement calendar integration with popular calendar services. Handle both authenticated and anonymous user scenarios.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure proper authorization checks for booking access. Validate booking ID parameters to prevent unauthorized access.
